description: This Python source file defines a Gmail agent that can read, draft, and send emails using Gmail. It includes class definitions for email output, creates an agent with specific capabilities, and demonstrates usage examples for finding emails and composing responses.

classes.name: FindEmailOutput
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the output of a Gmail email search, including message ID, thread ID, references, in-reply-to, subject, and body.

methods.name: None explicitly defined
methods.description: The file primarily defines variables and class instances, no additional methods are explicitly defined.
